text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Oh. Pokke. Thanks for 
yesterday. That skirt-chaser was 
a real pain. Saved me there.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: All good. Just yelled a little at him is all.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Well, news of that guy's been 
spreading, so you prob won't run 
into any more trouble for a while.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Wuh? Scary stuff. 
Spread the news, like?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Eh, I just told my friends about him, 
and they got real mad.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
So they spread the word. 
Well, that's how it often goes.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
That's how it goes, more like 
heck no? They're gonna blow 
it up, when it was just a small—

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
……Sighh…… Always like 
like this, aren't you…
